properties.entry: SELECT SPACE_NM, SPACE_SUB_NM, SPACE_INTRO, SPACE_GUIDE, PRECAUTIONS, REFUND_POLICY, SPACE_ADDR, SPACE_PNO, SPACE_TIME, SPACE_CLOSED_DT, SPACE_MAP_IMG, SPACE_MAP_PATH FROM SPACE WHERE SPACE_NO = ?
SELECT SPACE_IMG_PATH, SPACE_IMG_NM FROM SPACE_IMG WHERE SPACE_NO = ?
SELECT SPACE_ROOM_NM, SPACE_ROOM_PRICE, SPACE_ROOM_FIT, SPACE_ROOM_DESC FROM SPACE_ROOM WHERE SPACE_NO = ?
